desc: Change in Official Attitudes to Smoke Alarm Detection Opens Unique Opportunity.•	International Organisation•	Uncapped Earning Potential•	Advancement OpportunitiesExciting opportunity for an experienced commission sales agent to represent an International organisation with an earning potential of OTE $150K in your first year!The Company:Crossfire Australasia is an Australian owned company with over 30 years history in direct marketing, with offices in Sydney Melbourne and Brisbane and is the Australian Distributor for Omnishield specialists in fire detection since 1970Often regarded as industry leaders, we attribute our success to creating a fun and dynamic work environment that is continually developing its team with training and travel opportunities.  We are also a family owned company that promotes from within the organisation, wherever possible!Excellent incentive programs including annual opportunity for overseas and domestic travel.The ProductThe OmniShield state-of-the-art Fire sensors are the most reliable smoke fire units in the industry due to both the quality of its components and the precision manufacturing methods combined with technology to provide optimum protection for your family. Most homes are currently using Ionisation units and these are not only of substandard quality, watch this video to see why every home needs to update to our total family or early warning system and Fire preparedness audit to protect their home, photos, memorabilia and of course the ones they love.[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]The Role:We are looking for experienced Sales Agents to promote our products in the New South Wales and Victoria area. We have an easy and credible lead generation method to ensure you get as many leads as you need to be successful.As the successful applicant you will preferably have a background in business to consumer sales and be a capable closer. Most importantly, however, you will at the least have a passion for sales and helping people, your caring nature will see you succeed in the role. Full and comprehensive training provided.This is a unique business opportunity, where the successful applicant will receive the full support of an established and successful business while enjoying all the benefits of being self-employed without the negatives. You will be essentially in business for yourself but never by yourself. If you have the ability to close the deal then you'll see attractive commission payments arrive immediately!What We Offer:•	Fun & supportive work environment•	Uncapped commissions•	Full support from experienced sales management team•	Full administrative support•	Strong training & development•	Advancement opportunities•	Excellent incentive programs•	Travel opportunities.•	Extraordinary work/life balance, you choose your hours!About You•	Minimum 1 years in a similar sales role•	Results driven and team focused.  You want to work in a family friendly company with a reputation second to none, where your income is dictated by you.•	A good understanding of relationship selling•	A how can I attitude and a desire to be the best•	Intermediate computer literacy•	Strong understanding and knowledge of direct marketing•	Strong organisation skills & customer focused•	You are looking for a role that allows you to grow and develop your career while giving you financial freedom combined with a balanced quality of life.•	Reliable vehicle and current drivers' licence•	You are passionate about sales with a burning desire to succeed, want to earn more than an average income and have a willingness to do what is necessary to make it happen.For more information please call 07 5330 1338 or send your expression of interest by email to Gavin Hoult National Sales & Operation Manager gavin@[url removed, login to view]
title: Sales Professionals  (Private Advertiser)

desc: I am a retired brain injury lawyer in the UK and have completed the writing of an easy to read book on neurorehabilitation, with a foreword by an eminent Professor of Neurology. It is couched in very simple and easy to understand language designed to be read by the millions of people (victims and their friends and family as well as professionals) around the world who are affected by brain injury each year. It is a "How to..." book and contains lots of help and tips. I have a UK publisher who has contracted with me to publish the book. In addition to the "How to..." help and handy tips for understanding and coping with the aftermath of brain injury, the book will also carry appropriate messages from premium sponsors as well as contain a directory of other service providers wishing to promote their services. The book will be released geographically to optimise available sponsorship/advertising in different countries around the world (so, UK sponsors will not feature in the USA or Australian, or China, or wherever, edition, etc etc). I need a freelancer to assist me with identifying and optimising sponsorship/promotional/advertising clients and revenue around the world. I envisage a commission payable on sales arrangement. I have no settled idea about quantum of the potential revenue or even the value of the individual sponsorship/promotional opportunity to the premium sponsors/promoters, so I may need guidance on this. This is not a "ready to go" project. It needs a campaign designing, on a payment by results basis, so this may only be attractive to a freelancer who can see the potential here.
